LanguageData.RT_SdKfz251_Vehicle.label: Sd.Kfz.251 Ausf.D
LanguageData.RT_SdKfz251_Vehicle.description:
An armored vehicle which could carry 8 soldiers each time, though they are almost unprotected.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1, Passenger x8
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
7.62x51mm（Support MG）
